Uses of Package
net.gree.asdk.api

Packages that use net.gree.asdk.api
net.gree.asdk.api   
 

Classes in net.gree.asdk.api used by net.gree.asdk.api
Achievement
          Class representing one achievement
Achievement.AchievementChangeListener
          This is the listener to lock and unlock achievements.
Achievement.AchievementListUpdateListener
          This is the listener to receive the list of achievements.
GreePlatform
          This class has a weak singleton pattern.
GreePlatform.BadgeListener
          Listener called after every badge update.
GreeResourcesImpl
          This is an interface to implement other method for loading resource identifier.
GreeUser
          Implements GreeUser API, a la OpenSocial People API.
GreeUser.GreeIgnoredUserListener
          Delivery of ignored users.
GreeUser.GreeUserListener
          Delivery of user results.
GreeUser.LogLabelValue
          implement this if you want to use the method GreeUser.logGreeUser(int index, int count, GreeUser[] users).
IconDownloadListener
          The callback interface that is used for icon downloading.
Leaderboard
          Implements Gree Leaderboard API.
Leaderboard.LeaderboardListener
          Delivery leaderboard results.
Leaderboard.LogLabelValue
          Interface for receiving logging of object values.
Leaderboard.Score
          the Score object hold one score for one user.
Leaderboard.ScoreListener
          Delivery of array of score results.
Leaderboard.SuccessListener
          Delivery of pass/fail results, used when uploading or deleting a score for a leaderboard.
ModeratedText
          Implements GREE ModeratedText / Inspection API.
ModeratedText.ModeratedTextListener
          Delivery of array of moderated text results.
ModeratedText.SuccessListener
          Delivery of pass/fail results for moderatedText.
ScreenShot.OpenGlRenderer
          Use this class if you want to implement your own drawToCanvas method, otherwise you can just use Screenshot.defaultGlRenderer.
ScreenShot.SurfaceViewRenderer
          This is an interface for the Screenshot api in case you are using a SurfaceView.
